text: aur jab vah madayan ke paanee par pahuncha to usane usapar paanee pilaate logon ko ek giroh paaya. aur unase hatakar ek or do striyon ko paaya, jo apan jaanavaron ko rok rahee theen. usane kaha, "tumhaara kya maamala hai?" unhonne kaha, "ham us samay tak paanee nahin pila sakate, jab tak ye charavaahe apane jaanavar nikaal na le jaen, aur hamaare baap bahut hee boodhe hai.
